question: [File: aptos-core/protos/rust/src/pb/aptos.indexer.v1.serde.rs] [All u64 version fields] [Integer Arithmetic Overflow] Across all structs deserializing version numbers (lines 265, 273, 787, 1100, 1265, 1460, 1600, 1760, 2190, 2413, 2881, 3112, 3234), can attackers provide values near u64::MAX that cause overflow in subsequent range calculations?
